projects.title: DIY Bookshelf
projects.shortDescription: Create a beautiful bookshelf from scratch
projects.description: This project involves building a bookshelf using wooden planks and screws.
steps: Cut the wooden planks to the desired size.
Attach the shelves to the frame.
Sand and paint the bookshelf as desired.

projects.title: DIY Coffee Table
projects.description: This project guides you through creating a coffee table using reclaimed wood.
steps: Cut the wood to create the tabletop and legs.
Assemble the tabletop and attach the legs.
